    1. I bought a USB-C universal dock for my MacBook Pro and now I don't need a power supply or any dongles. 😎 One cord supplies power, two external monitors, Ethernet to my NAS, and sound. I used to have to plug in 4 dongles every time I sat at my desk #siliconvalleyproblems
